results.name: LEGO Scooby-Doo! Escape from Haunted Isle

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04, Mint 17 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Single Core Processor or 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 1 GB RAM (Shared Memory is not recommended)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL compatible

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card with latest drivers
